title: How to use Venus Silk-expert IPL, powered by Braun
description: Permanent hair reduction with the only IPL technology that adapts to your skin.

asset.author: Braun
asset.description: Permanent hair reduction with the only IPL technology that adapts to your skin.

transcripts: Introducing Venus silk expert by Braun intense pulsed life and you standard in permanent visible hair removal first remove the hair in the area you wish to treat and then pat your skin try once the Venus silk expert IPL is plugged in the nozzle needs to be in full contact with the skin to ensure it works correctly it then automatically adapts to your different skin tones with every flash so theres no guess work for larger body areas use providing mode hold down the button and treat along your skin for a smaller areas press and release the treatment button if not in proper contact with the skin the LED bars will turn red for sensitive areas or if its your first time you can use the gentle mode its important to wipe clean after every use in the first phase of your treatment treat once a week for four to 12 weeks then adjust to your needs the result is permanent visible hair removal Venus silk expert by braun IPL
